tool.name: Tomo Reconstruct
tool.command: mkdir tomo_reconstruct_plots; $__tool_directory__/../pip_install.sh 'certif-pyspec==1.5.3' && cp $input_file reduced.nex && cp $center_file centers.yaml && cp $tool_config reconstruct.yaml CHAP --config $__tool_directory__/pipeline_reconstruct.yaml

configfiles.configfile: #slurp #echo 'x_bounds:' # #if str($x_bounds.type_selector) == "full_range" #echo '- -1' # #echo '- -1' # #else #echo '- ' + str($x_bounds.low) # #echo '- ' + str($x_bounds.upp) # #end if #echo 'y_bounds:' # #if str($y_bounds.type_selector) == "full_range" #echo '- -1' # #echo '- -1' # #else #echo '- ' + str($y_bounds.low) # #echo '- ' + str($y_bounds.upp) # #end if

param.name: type_selector
param.label: Choose reconstructed image range in the x-direction
param.option: Manually enter the image range in the x-direction

param.name: type_selector
param.label: Choose reconstructed image range in the y-direction
param.option: Manually enter the image range in the y-direction

tool.help:
usage: PROG [-h] [--config CONFIG] [--verbose]
options: -h, --help show this help message and exit --config CONFIG Input configuration file --verbose verbose output
